document_data.mainbody:
Halassas Waterwell & Fine Wines was a spirits shop found in the city of Yartar. It was owned by the acerbic proprietor Halassa, an elderly woman who seemed to know every single person in the North.
The shop was located just south of the Fishyard marketplace.
Located within Halassas was its namesake well. The well was encircled by the establishments well-stocked cellars that went deep underground.
Halassa sold a great variety of spirits, of human, dwarven, halfling, and gnomish origin, at very sensible prices. Additionally, she offered a complimentary bucket of cooled well water to any Yartarran that requested one.
